0.text: Innate: Xin Zhao gains a Determination I and Determination II stack for every  Wind Becomes Lightning strike or basic attack  on-hit, up to a maximum of two.

1.text: At two Determination I stacks, Xin Zhao's next  Wind Becomes Lightning strike or basic attack  on-hit consumes the stacks to  heal him for 7 − 92 (based on level) (+ 10% AD) (+ 55% AP).

2.text: At two Determination II stacks, Xin Zhao's next  Wind Becomes Lightning strike or basic attack  on-attack consumes the stacks to deal 15 / 25 / 35 / 45% (based on level) AD bonus physical damage.

0.text: Active: Xin Zhao empowers his spear for 5 seconds, causing his next three basic attacks  on-attack to have an  uncancelable windup, deal bonus physical damage and reduce his other abilities'  cooldowns by 1 second each. The second attack will refresh Three Talon Strike's duration.

1.text: The third attack consumes the effect to  knock up the target for 0.75 seconds.

2.text: Three Talon Strike  resets Xin Zhao's basic attack timer and is affected by  critical strike modifiers.

0.text: Active: Xin Zhao uses his spear to slash in an arc and, after the cast time, unleashes a thrust in a line in the target direction. Each strike deals physical damage to all enemies hit, modified to 50% − 100% (based on level) against  minions, and the thrust's damage is increased by 0% − 33.3% (based on critical strike chance). Enemies hit by the thrust are also  slowed by 50% for 1.5 seconds and, if they are a champion or a monster, are  Challenged and  revealed for 3 seconds.

1.text: The durations of  Three Talon Strike,  Audacious Charge's bonus attack speed, and  Crescent Guard are delayed relative to Wind Becomes Lightning's cast time after 0.2 seconds of its activation.

2.text: Wind Becomes Lightning's damage  heals Xin Zhao for 33.3% of his  life steal.

0.text: Active: Xin Zhao  dashes to the target enemy's location, dealing magic damage to all enemies around the primary target and  slowing them by 30% for 0.5 seconds. Audacious Charge's range is increased against  Challenged targets.

1.text: Xin Zhao then gains  bonus attack speed for 5 seconds.

2.text: Xin Zhao cannot cast  Wind Becomes Lightning while dashing, but he may still buffer it.  Three Talon Strike and  Crescent Guard can both be cast during the dash.

0.text: Passive - Challenge: The last enemy champion hit by Xin Zhao's basic attacks,  Wind Becomes Lightning's thrust or  Audacious Charge is  Challenged for 3 seconds.

1.text: Active: Xin Zhao sweeps his spear around him, dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies, capped at 600 against  monsters, and   knocking back all non- Challenged targets hit up-to 700 units over 0.75 seconds, as well as  stunning them for the same duration.

0.content: 75 / 175 / 275 (+ 100% bonus AD) (+ 110% AP) (+ 15% of target's current health)

2.text: For the next 5 seconds, Xin Zhao is also  invulnerable to enemy  champions more than 450-units away from him.
